TopicTitle: A simple request - A search bar/filter inside the Load Craft tab

Articles.Content:
When you get up to a lot of craft, it can be tiresome looking through all of them to find that one specific craft you want. 

So I would like to suggest a search bar/filter be added to the Load Craft tab in the VAB/SPH.
I agree, feels like forever scrolling through the pre-loaded craft
